function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of collaboration and networks among mid-size city public service managers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to incorporate green areas into urban policy may lead to inadequate planning for disease mitigation and public health in urban environments.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to change in decision-making may limit the implementation of measures to enhance green area relevance and public health benefits.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of piloting mobility pattern changes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of networking among park managers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underutilization of smart city resources","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate governance of urban green spaces in latin american cities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential access to green areas leading to avoidance of parks in poorer neighborhoods during the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of citizen participation in governance of urban green spaces during the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of expert-citizens on policy design without comprehensive stakeholder engagement.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of focus on non-capital cities and small cities in policy and research agendas","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary personnel and networks in public services governance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of training in ecosystems and environmental issues for top management in public services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of training and network-related capital in inter-agency governance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Leadership-dependent effectiveness in dedicated management governance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of citizen participation in pandemic response","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for adjusting public services during a time of crisis, leading to inadequate implementation of adaptive measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of network and knowledge sharing among public service managers, hampering the ability to adapt services to changing demands during a crisis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inter-agency governance compensating for lack of training and network-related capital, leading to improved coordination and response to crisis situations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Governance challenges in managing urban green spaces during the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access and multiple entry points may lead to inconsistent enforcement of mask-wearing and temperature checks, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging physical interaction through the use of mirrors and banners could lead to unintended close contact and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pilot opening of parks without monitoring precautions may lead to non-compliance with safety measures.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of personnel to monitor protocol compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient communication and awareness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with protocol by park visitors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective park closure as a response to controlling contagion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closure of parks not enforced","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of personnel to enforce safety protocols","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Desire to open parks without adequate safety measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased demand for park access leading to overcrowding","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental health issues due to restricted access to green spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to parks leading to mental health issues, physical inactivity, and domestic violence consequences","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scarce personnel to monitor compliance with protocols","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with curfew measures and park restrictions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Demand for park access leading to non-compliance with safety measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social resistance to following minimal protocol requests such as mask use and distancing.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vandalism of warning resources such as yellow ribbons and banners.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowding in restricted areas and resistance to park closures by some users.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with closure rules and mobility restrictions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of restrictions around urban green spaces leading to complaints from drivers and traffic accidents","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vandalism of yellow ribbons used to enclose restricted areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evasion of restrictions by young people during nights","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impromptu protocols and loose guidelines from national governments may lead to ineffective or insufficient protocols for using public spaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in adapting personnel to perform new tasks may lead to inadequate enforcement of disease prevention measures and inefficient management of public events.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the duration of the measures may lead to inadequate long-term planning, affecting budget allocation and personnel tasks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in funding for public agencies responsible for urban green spaces may result in insufficient resources to implement effective disease prevention measures and maintain the facilities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in enforcement leading to varying levels of actual mobility","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent communication and response to pandemic urgency","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of social distancing measures in public spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
